It's funny you people think your opinions matter, I say traps are the best thing ever, so they are. And yes it's gay, but I don't give a shit, know your place.

I don't like straight guy on guy yaoi at all, but I'm more than fine with traps, so long as it's in manga form. I love Locon's works because of a few reasons:

1: The plot... yes I'm a plot junkie and traps tend to have the best vanilla. Locon's have a tiny bit of bitter in there (like the guys preying on Kaname) but nothing to kill the story.
2: I love the facial expressions on Locon's traps, that cocky, rebellious grin on Kaname's face is great.
3: He pulls the tsundere card way better than other artists, which is fun to read in general.

You will never, ever catch me watching real gay porn. Ever. Traps are the exception, and only in some cases. Locon being one of them.
